lead_paragraph: KING--Francis P.,on March 3, 2016 in New York City at the age of 93. Born and raised in Ashland, OR, he attended the University of Oregon, served in the Army Air Corps in World War II, and later studied at the Ecole des Sciences Politiques (Paris) and Stanford University, where he received MA and Ph.D. degrees. He joined TIAA-CREF in 1953, where he was author of numerous articles and books on pension and other benefit plans, retiring in 1998 as Senior Research Officer. He is survived by his loving husband Kelly Karavites. Frank enjoyed a beautiful retirement traveling with Kelly to his beloved Paris and enjoyed all of NYC's many cultural events. A memorial mass will occur at St. Bart's Church in mid-April. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KING, FRANCIS P.

snippet: KING--Francis P.,on March 3, 2016 in New York City at the age of 93. Born and raised in Ashland, OR, he attended the University of Oregon, served in the Army Air Corps in World War II, and later studied at the Ecole des Sciences Politiques (Paris) and Stanford University, where he received MA and Ph.D. degrees. He joined TIAA-CREF in 1953, where he was author of numerous articles and books on pension and other benefit plans, retiring in 1998 as Senior Research Officer. He is survived by his loving husband Kelly Karavites. Frank enjoyed a beautiful retirement traveling with Kelly to his beloved Paris and enjoyed all of NYC's many cultural events. A memorial mass will occur at St. Bart's Church in mid-April. 1/3
